name: part_010
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・DAY1】ときのそら 8th Anniversary Party「Starry Bl∞min'」 [cB-gslGpCO0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Intermission with audience applause and a transition video clip.
Performance of the song '泡沫のメロディ' (Utakata no Melody).

subtitles.original: どこまでも続く
subtitles.english: Continuing endlessly

subtitles.original: ありのままずっと
subtitles.english: Forever as I am

subtitles.original: 輝けるように
subtitles.english: So that I can shine

subtitles.original: 碧い闇を越えて
subtitles.english: Beyond the blue darkness

subtitles.original: いつだって笑っていてよ
subtitles.english: Always be smiling

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Forever

subtitles.original: 行こう 有限の宇宙（そら）へ
subtitles.english: Let's go to the finite sky

subtitles.original: このまま終われないんだ
subtitles.english: It can't end like this

subtitles.original: 答えを延々と探して駆け抜けて
subtitles.english: Searching for answers endlessly, running through

subtitles.original: 何者かになりたくて
subtitles.english: Wanting to become someone

subtitles.original: 燦々と降る夕立を
subtitles.english: The brilliant evening shower falling

subtitles.original: ただ眺めていた
subtitles.english: I was just gazing at it

subtitles.original: 優しく寄り添って 心が晴れるのならば
subtitles.english: If my heart clears up by gently snuggling up

subtitles.original: 翼が生えたようさ
subtitles.english: It's like I've grown wings

subtitles.original: 今しがた
subtitles.english: Just now

subtitles.original: いつだって隣にいるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll always be by your side

subtitles.original: だって言葉紡いで歌うことが僕の運命だ
subtitles.english: Because weaving words and singing is my destiny

subtitles.original: 世界にありふれた虚しささえも上書きして
subtitles.english: Overwriting even the hollow feelings common in the world

subtitles.original: 路地裏に咲いた花のように宵を照らす
subtitles.english: Lighting up the night like a flower blooming in a back alley

subtitles.original: 小さな光に憧れて
subtitles.english: Longing for a small light

subtitles.original: 名前を持たない歌だって
subtitles.english: Even a song without a name

subtitles.original: 神様は認めてくれない
subtitles.english: God won't acknowledge it

subtitles.original: 一つ一つ枯れない花のように
subtitles.english: Like flowers that don't wither, one by one

subtitles.original: きのうの自分にさよならして
subtitles.english: Saying goodbye to yesterday's self

subtitles.original: こぼれた涙 蓋を笑えるその日まで
subtitles.english: Until the day I can laugh at the tears that spilled

subtitles.original: だって理想は遠ざかっていくばかり 脆かったんだよ
subtitles.english: Because ideals are only getting further away, I was fragile

subtitles.original: どれだけ手を伸ばして叫んだって届かないの
subtitles.english: No matter how much I reach out and shout, I won't reach it

subtitles.original: 横目で見過ごしたあの日々さえ信じられるなら
subtitles.english: If I can believe in even those days I looked away from

subtitles.original: 咆哮(ほうこう)振った歌響いて
subtitles.english: The roaring song resonates

subtitles.original: 足跡の向こう側が今日も煩(うるさ)い
subtitles.english: The other side of the footprints is noisy today too

subtitles.original: 行き止まりばかり足が竦(すく)んで立てないよ
subtitles.english: My legs are trembling with only dead ends, I can't stand

subtitles.original: 音のない世界から君を見つけて連れ出すんだ
subtitles.english: I'll find you from the silent world and take you away

subtitles.original: 言葉紡いで歌うことが僕の運命だ
subtitles.english: Weaving words and singing is my destiny

subtitles.original: 世界にありふれた虚しささえも上書きして
subtitles.english: Overwriting even the hollow feelings common in the world

subtitles.original: 路地裏に咲いた花のように宵を照らす
subtitles.english: Lighting up the night like a flower blooming in a back alley

subtitles.original: 小さな光に憧れて
subtitles.english: Longing for a small light

subtitles.original: 君の隣で笑えたなら
subtitles.english: If I could laugh by your side

subtitles.original: それなら！
subtitles.english: If so!

subtitles.original: 瞳の奥まで
subtitles.english: To the depths of your eyes

subtitles.original: 届くまで叫ぼう
subtitles.english: Let's shout until it reaches

subtitles.original: それなら彼方まで
subtitles.english: If so, to the beyond

subtitles.original: 嗚呼！
subtitles.english: Ah!

subtitles.original: さあ まだ鳴らしてる胸踊るスパークがね
subtitles.english: Come on, the heart-dancing spark is still ringing

subtitles.original: アヴァンチュラ 踊り
subtitles.english: Aventurary dance

subtitles.original: 80年先の未来 誰もが求める 運命(ウェンウェン)
subtitles.english: The future 80 years ahead that everyone seeks, destiny

subtitles.original: 8次元まで
subtitles.english: To the 8th dimension
